DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine effect fluid dairy product blood glucose insulin , satiety energy intake normal weight overweight/obese child age range 9-14 . Experiment 1 : The specific objective examine effect isocaloric isovolumetric amount 2 % M.F . milk , 1 % M.F . chocolate milk , 1.5 % M.F . yogurt drink , tropical punch water consume within pizza meal 60 min later appetite food intake . Experiment 2 compare effect 2 % M.F . milk tropical punch consume pizza meal 60 min later food intake , blood glucose , appetite hormone response .
DOC.brief_title: Fluid Dairy Products Consumed Before Within Pizza Meal Glycemic Response , Food Intake Satiety Children
DOC.criteria: Healthy Born term Diabetes Medications Lactoseintolerance allergy milk Breakfast skipper energy restrict diet
